name: Sausage Bread
author: Linda
summary: This is rich filling bread stuffed full of pepperoni and sausage. It's good as meal with a green salad on the side.
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) package hot bread roll mix
directions: Prepare roll mix according to package directions, letting rise only once, about 1 hour
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Line a large baking sheet with parchment paper
In a large skillet brown the pork sausage and pepperoni and drain well
In a large bowl, combine the cooked sausage mixture, parmesan cheese, mozzarella cheese, cheddar cheese, 2 beaten eggs, parsley flakes, garlic powder, MSG powder, onion flakes, and oregano
Divide the risen dough in two
On a floured board roll out one half to a rectangle about 1 inch thick
Spread 1/2 of the filling over the rectangle
Starting at the wide end roll two times then fold in the sides
Continue rolling until the end, making sure the seal is on top
Place rolls on the prepared baking sheet
Use toothpicks to help hold the seam shut
Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 1 hour
